Simulate SNP pattern

Source: vignettes/snp.Rmd
snp.Rmd
library(tekkamaki)
library(ggplot2)
set.seed(666L)

Generate a SNP matrix

result = tekka("--seed 42 -y40 -K100 -r2 -l2 --sa 2,2 --sj 2,2")
samples = result$sample_family[[1L]]
make_snp(samples, ss = c(1L, 2L))
#>       [,1] [,2] [,3]
#>  [1,]    0    0    0
#>  [2,]    0    0    0
#>  [3,]    0    1    0
#>  [4,]    0    0    0
#>  [5,]    0    0    0
#>  [6,]    0    1    0
#>  [7,]    0    0    0
#>  [8,]    0    1    0
#>  [9,]    0    0    0
#> [10,]    0    0    0
#> [11,]    0    0    0
#> [12,]    0    0    0
#> [13,]    0    0    0
#> [14,]    0    0    0
#> [15,]    0    0    0
#> [16,]    0    0    0
#> [17,]    0    1    0
#> [18,]    0    1    0
#> [19,]    0    0    0
#> [20,]    0    0    0
#> [21,]    0    1    0
#> [22,]    0    0    1
#> [23,]    0    1    0
#> [24,]    0    1    0
#> [25,]    0    1    0
#> [26,]    0    0    0
#> [27,]    0    0    0
#> [28,]    0    0    0
#> [29,]    0    0    0
#> [30,]    0    0    0
#> [31,]    0    0    0
#> [32,]    1    0    0

Visualize a generated gene genealogy

segments = gather_segments(samples)
genealogy = make_gene_genealogy(segments)
plot(genealogy) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "top")
